alert.note: Alert for Western Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ulster and southwestern Greene Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fleischmanns, or 19 miles southwest of Hunter, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shandaken, Mapledale, Big Indian, Oliverea, Spruceton, West Kill, Allaben, Belle Ayr, Seager, Pine Hill, Halcott Center, Highmount and Bushnellsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for east central New York.
